name: Alchemist: Prison Break
description:
CONTROLS:
WADS or ARROWS Move
Drag ingredients into your cauldron to throw at a guard then click Brew.

Welcome to "The Alchemist: Prison Break" - an action-packed video game that takes you on a thrilling journey through a world of magic, alchemy, and revenge. In this game, you will play as an alchemist who has been imprisoned for his heinous crimes against humanity, including conducting brutal experiments on living people. But now, he's had enough and is determined to break out of prison and take revenge on the city that wronged him.

As you navigate through the dangerous prison and fight off guards, you'll discover the dark secrets behind the alchemist's imprisonment and the true nature of his experiments. With powerful alchemical spells at your disposal, you'll be able to create powerful potions and weapons to help you overcome your enemies and escape the prison.

But it won't be easy - the city guards will stop at nothing to keep you locked up, and you'll need to use all of your wits and cunning to outsmart them and make your escape. With immersive gameplay, stunning graphics, and a gripping storyline, "The Alchemist: Prison Break" is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat from start to finish. Are you ready to take on the challenge?
